ComicInfo.Penciller: Gene Colan,Jack Keller,Tom Sutton,Jack Keller,Tom Sutton
ComicInfo.Title: Kid Colt--No More!; Call Them...Renegades; Six-Gun Challenge
ComicInfo.Summary:
Kid Colt--No More!: Kid Colt decides to fake his death and alter his appearance so he can live anonymously but when he sees how news of his death has caused an increase in crime he reclaims his identity.
Call Them...Renegades: The Renegades are assembled by Col. Travis to bring a letter to Sam Houston but are believed by those at the Alamo to be traitors.
Six-Gun Challenge: Roy wants revenge on Kid Colt because he sent his brother to prison. Kincaid asks Roy to join his gang in ambushing Colt but Roy refuses and eventually he and Colt join forces to stop Kincaid's gang.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Writer: Stan Lee,Roy Thomas,Gary Friedrich,Joe Gill,Stan Lee,Roy Thomas,Gary Friedrich,Joe Gill
